review_blob: Red IPA. Really great balance of malt and hops. Really smooth, sessionable. Mouthfeel is excellent. Not overly sweet, gentle hop finish.
beer_name: Blank Slate Fork In The Road

review_blob: This beer is delicious. A lot of coffee notes, with a hint of chocolate. Perfectly bittersweet. Smooth finish, with a lingering "dark chocolate" taste in your mouth.
Sweet up front, then followed with bitterness. Not much in between. A slightly sweeter finish and a bigger body would be preferable. The booze is hidden fairly well. Fairly sessionable.
Aroma is bland. Hop blend seems "muddy", and it's very overpowering. Leaves a chalky/pine feel in your mouth. Have a glass of water with it. Or maybe don't have the beer at all.
beer_name: Moerlein Northern Liberties India Pale Ale
